title: Chroma's have gone back to RP only?
body:
Hey guys, 
I went to purchase a Chroma today and I noticed the ones that use to be purchasable through IP have now been swapped to RP only again. I wasn't sure if I was the only one who saw this and was curious if there was a post or something I missed saying they were changing this back? Any rate, your thoughts are appreciated on this.

replies.body: IP sales are only for a certain period of time. I believe the dates for the most recent sale was August 25th - September 8th. We do plan on doing this several times a year, so you'll have more opportunities to grab chromas for IP in the future. :)
Ahh right on. I wasn't aware that it was limited time. Thanks for the clarification!
That's pretty sad. At least we got free Riot Kayle :)
It was a limited time kind of deal.
The chromas were only available through IP for a limited time I thought? Like a flash sale, only they will likely do it again next year around the same time with some of the newer chromas.
